select b.views, b.BOARD_SEQ, b.CATEGORY_SEQ, b.title , b.contents , b.upload_date , bi.img_name from BOARD b INNER JOIN board_img_rel bir ON b.BOARD_SEQ = bir.BOARD_SEQ INNER JOIN board_img bi ON bir.IMG_SEQ = bi.IMG_SEQ
where rownum <=4
ORDER BY b.views desc

select * from ( select b.views, b.BOARD_SEQ, b.CATEGORY_SEQ, b.title , b.contents , b.upload_date , bi.img_name from BOARD b INNER JOIN board_img_rel bir ON b.BOARD_SEQ = bir.BOARD_SEQ INNER JOIN board_img bi ON bir.IMG_SEQ = bi.IMG_SEQ ORDER BY b.upload_date desc )
where rownum =1
